review: Peter Piper Picked A Pack of Purple Peppers - test passed, no "puh" sound to be found on the recording.
This stands up and holds the microphone in place.The stand is study, easily adjustable, and withstands the rigours of use.
They look nice and do the job perfectly well.  The price is not too bad.  The colours help with organization.
Sticks are well organized and always in reach.  This is a must-have item for drummers and the well-organized.  It fits the set perfectly and is quite practical.
I sit. I drum. It works.  There's not much to say except that it get the job done very well.
